author: mratsim
content: <@291925846556540928> is the dev branch not used anymore for eth2-specs?

author: protolambda
content: <@570268431522201601> We have a `v09x` branch where `v0.9.x` (you guessed it...) changes are merged into before release to `master`. When merged into `master` they are backported to `dev`. And current `dev` is for v0.10 and later.

author: mratsim
content: ah I see, instead of going the usual branch --> dev --> tagged into master, you do a nice trip ðŸ˜›

author: protolambda
content: Yep, otherwise we would have experimental changes / phase 1+ changes in every patch version. We try to keep continued v0.9.x releases clean of unnecessary/obfuscating changes.
